thread.title: Digital Check Announces Windows 10 Certified Drivers for All Current Check Scanner Lines
thread.title_full: Digital Check Announces Windows 10 Certified Drivers for All Current Check Scanner Lines

title: Digital Check Announces Windows 10 Certified Drivers for All Current Check Scanner Lines
text:
Digital Check Announces Windows 10 Certified Drivers for All Current Check Scanner Lines September 29, 2015 02:22 PM   
NORTHBROOK, Ill.- Digital Check has developed updated drivers with Windows 10 certification for its current line of check scanners. The new drivers will be introduced through the company’s bank and software partners over the coming months, and include updates for the CheXpress CX30, TellerScan TS240 and BranchXpress BX7200 check scanners. The previous-generation TellerScan TS230, as well as all future Digital Check scanners, will also be supported. 
Rick Ooten, Digital Check’s Director of Product Management, says the update is part of the company’s commitment to providing ongoing support for its key product lines. “We realize that when people buy Digital Check scanners, they buy them with the expectation that they’ll last for years. A Windows 10 update ensures that their useful lifetime will be extended into the next decade, or even longer.” 
Because scanner drivers are typically included as part of check processing software, they will be pushed out as regular updates by banks and Digital Check software partners. Individual end users are advised not to update the drivers on their own, as doing so before they are tested with a particular software package risks destabilizing the system. 
Additional operating systems supported by Digital Check devices include Windows Vista, 7, 8 and 8.1, Mac OS X, and several Linux distributions. For more information, visit www.digitalcheck.com . 
About Digital Check 
Digital Check provides superior check and document scanner products for teller, branch automation, remote deposit capture, and remote lockbox applications. Digital Check’s TellerScan, CheXpress, BranchXpress, and SB series of electronic scanners are among the most cost-effective and reliable in the industry, and provide high-quality images with precise MICR accuracy.
